PrismaMod:AliceRelic.NAME: Alice's Bear
DESCRIPTIONS: When a monster dies draw 2 cards

PrismaMod:PrismaRuby.NAME: Ruby
PrismaMod:PrismaRuby.FLAVOR: A Kaleidostick that does some questionable things.
DESCRIPTIONS: Channel 1 random orb at the start of each combat.

PrismaMod:PrismaZwei.NAME: Zwei Stick
PrismaMod:PrismaZwei.FLAVOR: A combined Kaleidostick capable of unimaginable power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Channel 1 random orb at the start of each turn.

PrismaMod:PrismaTraceOn.NAME: Kanshou and Bakuya
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 25 cards played generate a trace card.

PrismaMod:PrismaTraceOnUpgrade.NAME: Kanshou and Bakuya+
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 20 cards played generate an upgraded trace card.

PrismaMod:PrismaSapphire.NAME: Sapphire
PrismaMod:PrismaSapphire.FLAVOR: A Kaleidostick that can magically help you to dance.
DESCRIPTIONS: Channel 1 orb at the start of each combat.

PrismaMod:PrismaSapphireUpgrade.NAME: Sapphire+
PrismaMod:PrismaSapphireUpgrade.FLAVOR: A Kaleidostick that increases your combat effectiveness.
DESCRIPTIONS: Channel 1 orb and gain 2 strength at the start of each combat.
